statements: SELECT * FROM allergy_information
SELECT ingredient_name, allergen_type FROM allergy_information WHERE ingredient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM allergy_information WHERE allergen_type = 'Peanut'
SELECT ingredient_name, allergen_description FROM allergy_information WHERE allergen_type = 'Dairy'
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, allergen_type, allergen_description FROM allergy_information ORDER BY allergen_type ASC
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, allergen_type, allergen_description FROM allergy_information WHERE ingredient_name = 'Peanuts';
SELECT * FROM allergy_information WHERE allergen_type = 'Dairy' ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergen_type FROM allergy_information WHERE allergen_description LIKE '%gluten%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(ingredient_id) AS max_id, MIN(ingredient_id) AS min_id FROM allergy_information;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_allergies FROM allergy_information WHERE allergen_type IN ('Nuts', 'Shellfish');
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_information FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT allergy_name, allergy_description FROM allergies ORDER BY allergy_id DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredients WHERE allergy_information IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_information FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 50
SELECT ingredient_name, COUNT(allergy_id) AS num_allergies FROM ingredients JOIN allergies ON ingredients.ingredient_id = allergies.ingredient_id GROUP BY ingredient_name HAVING num_allergies > 2
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE allergy_information LIKE '%gluten%' AND allergy_information LIKE '%milk%'

SELECT ingredients.ingredient_name, allergies.allergy_name FROM ingredients JOIN allergies ON ingredients.ingredient_id = allergies.ingredient_id ORDER BY ingredients.ingredient_name ASC, allergies.allergy_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredient_allergies
SELECT ingredient_id, allergy_type, allergy_description FROM ingredient_allergies ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC
SELECT category_name FROM ingredient_categories WHERE category_id = 3
SELECT source_name, source_address FROM ingredient_sources
SELECT * FROM ingredient_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Fruit%'
SELECT * FROM ingredient_allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Peanut' ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, allergy_type FROM ingredient_allergies WHERE ingredient_id > 100 AND allergy_type IN ('Dairy', 'Soy') ORDER BY ingredient_id ASC;
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_address FROM ingredient_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%Organic%' AND source_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM ingredient_categories WHERE category_name = 'Vegetables' OR category_name = 'Fruits' ORDER BY category_id ASC;
SELECT ingredient_id, allergy_type, allergy_description FROM ingredient_allergies WHERE ingredient_id < 50 OR allergy_type = 'Gluten' AND allergy_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_allergies;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_type FROM ingredient_allergies WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM allergy_types ORDER BY allergy_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM ingredient_categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_name, description FROM ingredient_allergies JOIN allergy_types ON ingredient_allergies.allergy_type = allergy_types.allergy_name;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_allergies;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_type FROM ingredient_allergies ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM allergy_types WHERE allergy_id = 1;

SELECT ingredient_name, category_name FROM ingredient_allergies INNER JOIN ingredient_category_mapping ON ingredient_allergies.ingredient_id = ingredient_category_mapping.ingredient_id INNER JOIN ingredient_categories ON ingredient_category_mapping.category_id = ingredient_categories.category_id;
SELECT ingredient_name, allergy_type FROM ingredient_allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Dairy' OR allergy_type = 'Nuts';
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_category FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_category;
SELECT recipe_id, ingredient_id, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_category FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions, recipe_id FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
